From: "Logo morph" <logomorph@...>

::Shadow Wing::

She woke up slowly.  Her optics not focusing right away.
"Oh, what happened?"
As her otpics focused, she realized that she was upsidedown on the ground. 
Her back up against a large tree and her talons were up in the air.
"Oh how do I get into these situations I'll never know."
She turned and dropped to her side. She saw that her wing was damaged.  It 
had a nasty looking tear and was cut in a few places.  Her body was 
scratched up a bit.  And her head hurt from landing on it. She stood up and 
tried to stretch her other wing. It moved but was very stiff.  She looked 
around and saw the trees were sindged or leveled from the blast.
THE BLAST!
"Oh boy, I got to get back to the Arc. I hope the others survived that 
blast. Shadow Wing Maximize!"

She transformed into bot mode and walked back to the Arc.
